actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a refund of Federal, State, and local taxes imposed with respect to the production of any property in lieu of the regular investment tax credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited refund of domestic taxes imposed on manufacturing activities in lieu of an investment tax credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a refund of Federal, State, and local taxes imposed with respect to the production of any property in lieu of the regular investment tax credit.
